name: Volpa
description:
A veritable force in marketing, VOLPA is a leading Scottish independent marketing agency. Our award winning team’s experience in marketing, public relations, graphic design, journalism and digital marketing spans the full marketing mix delivering exceptional returns on investment for our clients. Three times winner of the Scottish Event Award for Best Marketing Strategy, we are RAR Recommended for a spectrum of services.
You can count on us for award winning work, attention to detail and, most importantly, results. Twice shortlisted for the CIPR PRide Award for Most Outstanding Small Consultancy, we’re one of Scotland’s fastest growing marketing agencies and a force to be reckoned with when it comes to generating cunningly good publicity.
